data.criteria: We conducted a systematic search across twelve datasets, using a wide array of search terms. The search covered all data from the inception of each database up until Aug 16, 2022 and was later updated to include new entries up to May 26, 2023. We fine-tuned our search strategy based on previous systematic reviews3,51,62 to locate sources related to AI-based CAs for addressing mental health problems or promoting mental well-being. The search was limited to English-language publications. Complete lists of datasets and search strategies are detailed in Supplementary Table 7.
